attributes.action: change the present pensions of all government employees (local or national), cival servents, armed forces, police officers, MPs, public sector workers, etc. etc. to an employee contributory only scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hope people take up this petition as I believe that the hard working private sector tax paying population is not getting value for money for the contributions they are putting into the system. Why should they be expected to put up with a lesser pention than someone who works for the public sector. As private sector pensions are not about to be increased, then public sector pensions should be reduced. WE CAN NOT AFFORD THEM!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
